description: Israeli forces killed three Palestinians in the occupied West Bank on Wednesday amid clashes sparked by settlers, who rampaged through the town of Kafr Malik.
title: Israeli troops kill 3 Palestinians amid settler rampage

description: Israeli forces shot dead a 15-year-old boy in the occupied West Bank on Wednesday, the second teenager killed in three days.
title: Israeli forces kill child in occupied West Bank

description: Syrian security forces have detained an Assad regime air force officer who is under British and EU sanctions, the interior ministry said Wednesday.
title: Syria detains Assad-era air force officer under EU, UK sanctions

description: The US president said Wednesday that 'progress' was being made to end Israel's war on Gaza, as a new ceasefire push began more than 20 months into the war.
title: Trump sees 'progress' on Gaza, raising hopes for ceasefire

description: An Italian supermarket chain says it has stopped selling Israeli products in solidarity with Palestinians affected by war and hunger in the Gaza Strip.
title: Italian Coop supermarkets to stop selling Israeli products

description: It’s one thing to survive torture. For International Day in Support of Victims of Torture, Dr Ali Siddiqi explains why proving it happened can be so traumatic.
title: Trauma doesn't end when survivors of torture reach UK shores

description: Though Iran has been weakened by 12 days of war with Israel, Tel Aviv also saw significant failings in its defensive capacity, while its citizens are in shock.
title: Explainer: What were the real costs of the Iran-Israel war?

description: The association, considered Hezbollah's financial arm, has frozen payments multiple times before as the militant group faces a worsening financial situation
title: Hezbollah freezes war compensation via Al-Qard Al-Hassan: report

description: NATO allies pledge to spend 5 per cent of their GDP on defence by 2035, under pressure from the US, marking the biggest military boost since the Cold War.
title: NATO agrees to major defense spending hike after Trump push

description: All 36 signatories of the letter were reprimanded, with 31 being sent a 'notice of criticism' over their actions.
title: UK Jewish board suspends 5 members over letter against Gaza war

description: With airspace over multiple countries closed and thousands of flights cancelled or rerouted, the Iran-Israel war brought chaos to air travel in the Middle East
title: How the Iran-Israel war shut down the Middle East's airspace

description: Iran begins easing wartime internet restrictions after ceasefire with Israel, though key platforms like WhatsApp remain blocked without VPN access.
title: Iran eases internet curbs after ceasefire with Israel

description: Israel has suffered an estimated $12 billion in direct losses from its 12-day war with Iran, with total costs potentially rising to $20 billion.
title: Israel faces $12 billion in losses after 12-day war with Iran

description: Israel’s Leviathan gas field to resume operations within hours after war-linked shutdown, restoring exports to Egypt and Jordan amid easing regional tensions.
title: Israel's Leviathan gas field to resume operations after shutdown

description: Iraq arrests pro-Iran commentator Abbas al-Ardawi over a post claiming a French radar was hit by a drone, aiding Israel in its war with Iran.
title: Iraq arrests commentator over online post on Iran-Israel war

description: The observers warn that the Gaza file is far more complex, and regional "momentum" may not be enough to overcome entrenched political realities on both sides.
title: Is there momentum for a Gaza deal after Israel-Iran ceasefire?

description: Israel designates Iran’s central bank a terror group, targeting its “terror financing system”, a day after a ceasefire ends 12 days of Israel-Iran hostilities.
title: Israel designates Iran central bank 'terror organisation'

description: The elderly woman succumbed to her wounds after she was shot in the head by Israeli forces, amid worsening raids on Palestinian cities.
title: Israeli forces kill elderly Palestinian woman in Jerusalem raid

description: Trump claims US strikes “obliterated” Iran’s nuclear program, but leaked intel says damage was limited; Iran suspends IAEA cooperation after ceasefire.
title: Trump insists Iran nuclear programme set back 'decades'

description: The Lebanese army has arrested a senior Islamic State leader known as “Qasoura,” seizing weapons and drone-making gear in a major intelligence operation.
title: Lebanese army arrests Islamic State leader in major raid

description: Pope Leo XIV called for peace in the Israel-Iran war, urging an end to “bullying and revenge” and expressing solidarity with Christians across the Middle East.
title: Pope Leo XIV urges peace, rejects ‘bullying’ in Iran-Israel war

description: France relayed the US ceasefire proposal to Iran before the truce, helping broker an end to the 12-day Israel-Iran war, diplomatic sources confirmed.
title: US asked France to speak to Iran before Israel truce: source

description: Russia's cautious solidarity with Iran amid fears of antagonising the US and Israel highlights its struggle to regain great power status in the Middle East
title: Why the Iran-Israel war was a delicate tightrope walk for Russia

description: Israeli missile attacks and government retaliation divided Iranian society, where some saw a chance for reform while others feared widespread destruction
title: War came to Iran, but for some, so did the hope for change

description: Qatar has once again shown its invaluable role by mediating the Israel-Iran ceasefire and defending its airspace during Iran's missile attack on Monday.
title: How Qatar yet again proved indispensable to regional peace

description: Israeli forces are killing Palestinians near aid sites on a daily basis, as vital supplies, including baby formula, run out.
title: Israel kills dozens in Gaza amid aid, baby formula shortages

description: El Al is offering discounted return flights to bring Israelis back home, even as many inside the country remain barred from leaving.
title: Israel launches discounted flights to lure Israelis abroad back

description: The World Bank approved over $1 billion for infrastructure projects in Iraq, Syria, and Lebanon to support reconstruction and economic recovery.
title: World Bank approves $1bn for projects in Lebanon, Syria, Iraq

description: Ukraine found a new AI-powered, anti-jamming drone with Iranian parts, signalling advanced Russia-Iran tech ties and a growing drone threat.

description: The US declared a ceasefire between Iran and Israel, but conflicting reports and no formal deal leave doubts over whether the war is really over.

description: Qaani had been rumoured to have been killed by Israeli airstrikes, which killed several high-ranking IRGC commanders, including its chief, Hossein Salami.
title: Quds Force chief appears at Tehran 'victory' celebrations

description: A court has ordered ABC to pay Lattouf $45,000 in compensation after it was found to have broken employment laws for dismissing her.

description: Iran executes three more accused of spying for Israel, bringing the total to six since 16 June, as the ceasefire with Israel holds.

description: Launched in January 2024 as a humanitarian lifeline, Canada’s Temporary Resident Visa for Gaza Palestinians faces criticism for being inaccessible and flawed
title: How Canada's visa programme failed Palestinian families in Gaza

description: Iran parliament votes to suspend IAEA cooperation, vows to accelerate nuclear program with final approval pending from the Supreme National Security Council.

description: Marco Rubio says Iran is "much further" from nukes after US strike as Trump rejects intel report suggesting only minor setback to Tehran's nuclear programme.

description: "This could be a watershed Democratic primary. Mamdani, if elected, would probably be the most openly socialist big city mayor in the country."

description: The fragile ceasefire between Iran and Israel continues to hold as dozens of Gazans were killed overnight.

description: The fragile ceasefire between Iran and Israel continues to hold as dozens of Palestinians were killed in ongoing Israeli attacks across the Gaza Strip.

description: Despite advanced radar systems, Iraq remains unable to secure its airspace, with its skies recently used as a corridor during the 12-day Iran-Israel conflict.

description: Pezeshkian said Iran was willing to ready to resolve the issues pertaining to the nuclear deal at the negotiating table with the US.
title: Iran willing to return to talks as Israel ceasefire takes hold

description: Among the charges for those arrested at the Palestine Action protest include assaulting emergency workers and a racially aggravated offence.

description: The UK will purchase 12 nuclear weapon-capable F-35A fighters, which Keir Starmer described will deter hostile threats that threaten the UK and its allies.

description: The study showed that the AI chatbot's ability to provide accurate, reliable, and consistent information was flawed and had significant limitations.
title: Grok shows 'flaws' in fact-checking Israel-Iran war, study shows
